query.statement: SELECT D.ID, ( SELECT SUM(VALUE) AS MV FROM TB_DEMO_DATA WHERE ID = D.ID AND SUBSTR(DATE, 1, 6) = SUBSTR(REPLACE(date(), '-', ''), 1, 6) GROUP BY ID, SUBSTR(DATE, 1, 6) ) MV, ( SELECT SUM(VALUE) AS WV FROM TB_DEMO_DATA WHERE ID = D.ID AND DATE BETWEEN REPLACE(DATE('now', '-7 day'), '-', '') AND REPLACE(date(), '-', '') GROUP BY ID ) WV, ( SELECT SUM(VALUE) AS DV FROM TB_DEMO_DATA WHERE ID = D.ID AND DATE = REPLACE(date(), '-', '') GROUP BY ID, DATE ) DV FROM TB_DEMO_DATA D GROUP BY ID ORDER BY ID ;
SELECT ID, SUBSTR(DATE, 1, 6) AS DATE, SUM(VALUE) AS "VALUE" FROM TB_DEMO_DATA WHERE SUBSTR(DATE, 1, 6) = SUBSTR(REPLACE(date(), '-', ''), 1, 6) GROUP BY ID, SUBSTR(DATE, 1, 6) ORDER BY ID
SELECT ID, SUBSTR(DATE, 1, 6), SUM(VALUE) FROM TB_DEMO_DATA WHERE DATE BETWEEN REPLACE(DATE('now', '-7 day'), '-', '') AND REPLACE(date(), '-', '') ORDER BY DATE
SELECT ID, DATE, VALUE FROM TB_DEMO_DATA ORDER BY DATE
